modShortDescription: A decoration pack that will slowly be added to over time. These are Telric's own models that he has created over time.
modDescription:
A decoration pack that will slowly be added to over time. These are Telric’s own models that he has created over time. Feel free to use them in any mod you want.

To start, simply craft one of the master blocks. Search ‘master’ in your recipes. With a master block in your hand, hold R to choose which block you want. Since these are of decorative value, they are cheap to craft, but also have limited health. Some of these items can be interacted with. Some can be used with items, like the dart board. You can craft a dart thrower, then a few darts. Using left click you can throw a dart at the board that will stick. It comes in two colors: red and green, to allow you to play with a friend.

Does not require restart.

Requires client to install as well as server.

Tested and works with Alpha 19.4 b3

Recommended to be played single player or multiplayer. Works fine on servers as well.

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/b07ywy07n3tr05g/TelricsDecorationsPackA19.zip?dl=1)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19976-telrics-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Telric](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/telric/)
